thread.title: MHC
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by MHC

author: MHC
title: MHC
text: We ordered 60 custom designed t-shirts from Rush Order Tees and we were thrilled with the product! The company carefully looked at our design and made sure the products looked exactly how we wanted. They also delivered 5 days before they said they would which was an added bonus! We worked with Rush Order Tees representative Geraldine, who was helpful and prompt in her replies. We will definitely work with both her and this company again! 5 stars.
